titles.title: Charitable Equity for Veterans Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the deductibility of charitable contributions to certain organizations for members of the Armed Forces.
Charitable Equity for Veterans Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Charitable Equity for Veterans Act of 2021
This bill expands the deductibility of charitable contributions to all federally-chartered tax-exempt organizations serving current and former members of the Armed Forces.
